pairs.value: 欢迎来到 Reign of Nether

pairs.key: Press F12 to toggle RTS camera and join the game
pairs.value: 按下 F12 进入RTS游戏视角并加入游戏

pairs.key: Use '/rts-help' to see the list of all commands
pairs.value: 使用 '/rts-help' 来查看所有指令

pairs.key: As a server op you may use:
pairs.value: 如果你是游戏管理员,你可能用的到以下指令:
无法在游戏边界外开始

pairs.key: You already started your RTS match!
pairs.value: 你已经开始了一把RTS游戏

pairs.key: Join the game as the Villager Faction.
pairs.value: 使用<村民>阵营加入游戏

pairs.key: Spawns 3 villagers to the target location.
pairs.value: 生成3个村民在指定位置.

pairs.key: Join the game as the Monster Faction.
pairs.value: 使用<怪物>阵营加入游戏

pairs.key: Spawns 3 zombie villagers at the target location.
pairs.value: 生成3个僵尸村民在指定位置.

pairs.key: Join the game as the Piglin Faction.
pairs.value: 使用<猪灵>阵营加入游戏

pairs.key: Spawns in 3 piglin grunts to the target location.
pairs.value: 生成3个猪灵在指定位置.

pairs.key: A gazebo at the centre of your village that produces villagers.
pairs.value: 一个城镇的中心,可以生产工作的村民.

pairs.key: You may only have one capitol building at any time.
Storage for units and players to drop off resources
pairs.value: 存储工作单位和玩家的资源.

pairs.key: A simple house that provides population supply.
pairs.value: 一个简单的住所,可以增加村庄补给.

pairs.key: A wheat field that be can tilled to collect food.
pairs.value: 一个可以耕种小麦的农田,每个种子使用1木材.

pairs.key: Workers automatically use wood to replant seeds while working.
pairs.value: 工人在工作时会自动使用木材重新播种.

pairs.key: A fortified tower that can garrison units.
pairs.value: 一个可以驻扎单位的防御塔.

pairs.key: Garrisoned ranged units have increased range.
pairs.value: 驻扎的远程单位射程增加.

pairs.key: Can hold a maximum of 3 units
A training ground for Pillagers and Vindicators
pairs.value: 一个训练掠夺者和卫道士的地方.

pairs.key: A smithy to forge military upgrades and iron golems.
pairs.value: 一个用于升级军事科技和训练铁傀儡的铁匠铺.

pairs.key: A magical tower that is home to Witches and Evokers.
pairs.value: 一个居住着女巫和唤魔者的魔法塔.

pairs.key: An enchanting table surrounded by pillars of books.
pairs.value: 一个被书架充能的附魔台.
用于研究与魔法相关的升级.

pairs.key: A grand castle that can produce ravagers
pairs.value: 一个能够生产劫掠兽的大型城堡,

pairs.key: Requires an arcane tower and a barracks.
pairs.value: 需要建造奥术塔和兵营.

pairs.key: An Iron Golem that can be built in the field.
pairs.value: 一个可以在战场上建造的铁傀儡.

pairs.key: A bridge built to traverse water.
pairs.value: 一座用于跨越水域的桥.

pairs.key: Must be connected to land or another bridge.
pairs.value: 必须与陆地或者另一座桥连接.

pairs.key: Can be built over lava (but isn't fireproof!)
pairs.value: 可以在岩浆上建造.(但是不防火)

pairs.key: Bridges can be repaired or attacked by anyone.
pairs.value: 桥梁可以被任何人攻击或修复.

pairs.key: A worker that can construct and repair
pairs.value: 最基本的工人,可以建造和修理建筑

pairs.key: A devious hag who can heal and harm with potions.
pairs.value: 一个狡猾的巫师，能用药水进行治疗或伤害.

p.k: A villager armed with an axe for melee combat.
p.v: 一个手持斧头进行近战的村民.

p.k: Upgraded with diamond axes that deal +2 damage
p.v: 研发钻石斧以提升伤害 +2

p.k: An enormous beast that can smash through hordes of enemies.
p.v: 一个能够冲破成群敌人的巨型野兽.

p.k: They can roar to knockback enemies and be mounted by pillagers.
p.v: 它们能通过咆哮击退敌人，并且可以被掠夺者骑乘.

p.k: A villager armed with a crossbow for ranged combat.
p.v: 一个手持弩进行远程战斗的村民.

p.k: Upgraded with multishot crossbows that fire triple arrows
p.v: 可以研发多重射击附魔,一次发射三根箭矢.

p.k: A slow hulking golem of metal with a powerful melee.
p.v: 一个行动缓慢、体型庞大的金属傀儡，拥有强大的近战能力.

p.k: attack that deals double damage to buildings.
p.v: 对建筑造成双倍伤害.

p.k: A learned wizard that can cast combat spells.
p.v: 一个能够施放战斗法术的博学巫师.

p.k: Requires a Library.
p.v: 需要图书馆.

p.k: An ominous tower that can garrison units.
p.v: 一个能够驻扎单位的不祥之塔.

p.k: Garrisoned ranged units have increased range.
p.v: 驻扎的远程单位射程增加.

p.k: Can hold a maximum of 3 units
p.v: 可进驻3个单位.

p.k: A fiery cage containing the power to create creepers.
p.v: 一个地牢刷怪笼,拥有生成苦力怕的力量.

p.k: Requires a Laboratory.
p.v: 需要实验室.

p.k: A field of the dead that can raise Zombies and Skeletons
p.v: 一个能够召唤僵尸和骷髅的亡者之地.

p.k: A spooky house that provides population supply.
p.v: 一个提供补给上限的鬼屋.

p.k: A sinister lab that can research new technologies
p.v: 一个能够研究新科技的阴森实验室.

p.k: based on the other buildings that have been built.
p.v: 基于已建造的其他建筑进行研究.

p.k: A tomb of the dead that produces zombie villagers.
p.v: 一个能够生产僵尸村民的亡者陵墓.

p.k: Distorts time to midnight within a 80 block radius.
p.v: 在80格范围内将时间扭曲为黑夜.

p.k: You may only have one capitol building at any time.
p.v: 该建筑只能拥有一个.

p.k: A pumpkin field that be can harvested to collect food.
p.v: 一个可以收割南瓜以获取食物的农场.

p.k: Pumpkins don't need to replanted but farms cost more up front.
p.v: 南瓜无需重新种植，但农场初始成本较高.

p.k: A silken cave to grow spiders, both large and poisonous.
p.v: 一个可以培育大型蜘蛛和剧毒蜘蛛的巢穴.

p.k: Requires a Laboratory.
p.v: 需要实验室

p.key: A bridge built to traverse water.
p.value: 一座用于跨越水域的桥.

p.key: Must be connected to land or another bridge.
p.value: 必须与陆地或者另一座桥连接.

p.key: Can be built over lava (but isn't fireproof!)
p.value: 可以在岩浆上建造.(但是不防火)

p.key: Bridges can be repaired or attacked by anyone.
p.value: 桥梁可以被任何人攻击或修复.

p.key: Storage for units and players to drop off resources
p.value: 存储工作单位和玩家的资源.

p.k: A villainous stronghold that can produce wardens
p.v: 一个能够生产监守者的邪恶要塞

p.k: and garrison up to 7 units.
p.v: 并且可以驻扎7个单位.

p.k: Distorts time to midnight within a 60 block radius
p.v: 在60格范围内将时间扭曲为午夜.

p.k: Requires a Graveyard, Spider Lair and Dungeon.
p.v: 需要墓地、蜘蛛巢穴和地牢.

p.k: A fortified barracks to house military piglins,
p.v: 一个用来容纳军用猪灵的加固兵营,

p.k: enabling them to be produced at military portals.
p.v: 可以在军事传送门中解锁传送.

p.k: Also garrisons up to 5 units.
p.v: 并且可以驻扎5单位.

p.k: Requires a Basic Portal
p.v: 需要基础传送门.

p.k: An obsidian portal used to spread nether blocks.
p.v: 一个用于扩散下界区域的黑曜石传送门.

p.k: Can be upgraded for various different functions.
p.v: 可以升级以获得各种不同的功能.

p.k: A bridge built to traverse water or lava.
p.v: 一个用于跨越水域或熔岩的桥梁.

p.k: Must be connected to land or another bridge.
p.v: 必须与陆地或者另一座桥连接.

p.k: Bridges can be repaired or attacked by anyone.
p.v: 桥梁可以被任何人修复或攻击.

p.k: Central Portal (Capitol)
p.v: 中央传送门

p.k: The primary portal to transport piglin grunts from the nether.
p.v: 中央传送门,用于将猪灵从下界折跃到此.

p.key: You may only have one capitol building at any time.

p.k: Scorching pillars of lava and brick to keep blazes,
p.v: 由熔岩和砖块构成的炽热之地，用来安置烈焰人.

p.k: enabling their production at military portals.
p.v: 使它们能够在军事传送门中传送.

p.k: Requires Hoglin Stables.
p.v: 需要疣猪兽马厩.

p.k: An imposing nether fortress that allows military portals
p.v: 一个令人望而生畏的下界堡垒，允许军事传送门传送

p.k: to produce ghasts and garrisons up to 7 units.
p.v: 恶魂并且可以驻扎最多7个单位.

p.k: Requires a Flame Sanctuary and a Wither Shrine.
p.v: 需要烈焰神殿和凋灵神殿.

p.k: A shelter to keep Hoglins stabled in the overworld,
p.v: 一个用来安置疣猪兽在主世界的马厩.

p.k: enabling their production at military portals.
p.v: 允许他们能在军事传送门传送.

p.k: Requires a Basic Portal
p.v: 需要基础传送门.

p.k: A field of netherwart that can be farmed collect food.
p.v: 一个可以收割地狱疣以获取食物的农场.

p.k: Workers automatically use wood to replant while working.
p.v: 工人在工作时会自动使用木材重新播种.

p.k: An obsidian portal used to spread nether blocks.
p.v: 一个用于扩散下界区域的黑曜石传送门.

p.k: Can be upgraded for various different functions.
p.v: 可以升级以获得各种不同的功能.

p.k: A dark shrine dedicated to the power of Withers.
p.v: 一个供奉凋灵力量的黑暗神殿.

p.k: Enables wither skeletons production at military portals.
p.v: 使凋灵骷髅能够在军事传送门中传送.

p.k: Requires a Bastion.
p.v: 需要堡垒.

p.v: (夜晚)

p.v: 游戏时间:

p.v: 建造出界或过于靠近边界

p.k: Ground is not flat enough
p.v: 地面不够平坦

p.k: Too close to another building
p.v: 与其他建筑太近

p.k: Must be built on nether terrain
p.v: 必须建造在下届感染土壤上

p.k: Must be placed in water or lava
p.v: 必须建造在水或岩浆上

p.k: Area is unexplored
p.v: 区域未探索

p.v: 你没有足够的

p.v: 木头

p.v: 矿石

p.v: 和木头

p.k: and ore
p.v: 和矿石

p.k: A fiery elemental that shoots fireballs from afar.
p.v: 一个能够远程发射火球的火焰元素.

p.k: Attacks are fast and ignite enemies but inaccurate.
p.v: 攻击速度快且能点燃敌人，但是不够准确.

p.k: Requires a Flame Sanctuary.
p.v: 需要烈焰神殿.

p.k: A piglin armed with a sword for combat.
p.v: 一个持剑战斗的猪灵.

p.k: A massive flying creature that fires explosive fireballs
p.v: 一个发射爆炸性火球的巨型飞行生物.

p.k: from a great distance to siege units and buildings.
p.v: “从远距离对攻城单位和建筑物进行攻击.

p.k: Slow and fragile, but can only be targeted by ranged units.
p.v: 行动缓慢且脆弱，但只能被远程单位攻击.

p.k: Requires a Fortress.
p.v: 需要堡垒.

p.k: A piglin worker that can construct and
p.v: 一个可以建造的猪灵工人，并且

p.k: repair buildings and gather resources.
p.v: 可以修复建筑和采集资源.

p.k: A piglin that throws tridents in battle.
p.v: 一个在战斗中投掷三叉戟的猪灵。

p.k: Requires a Bastion.
p.v: 需要要塞.

p.k: A beast trained for war. Deals 50% more damage to buildings.
p.v: 一个经过战争训练的野兽，对建筑物造成50%额外伤害.

p.k: Can be upgraded to be mountable by Headhunters.
p.v: 可以升级为由猎头者骑乘.

p.k: Requires Hoglin Stables.
p.v: 需要疣猪兽马厩.

p.k: A charcoal black skeleton that afflicts
p.v: 一个炭黑色的骷髅，能够施加

p.k: wither on enemies and deals bonus damage
p.v: “凋零”效果给敌人，并造成额外伤害

p.k: (up to double) to enemies near death.
p.v: “对濒死的敌人造成额外伤害（最多双倍）.

p.k: Requires a Wither Shrine.
p.v: 需要凋零神殿.

p.k: An explosive monster that can blow up units and buildings.
p.v: 一个可以通过爆炸摧毁建筑、炸伤单位的怪物

p.k: Deals less damage to capitol buildings.
p.v: 对大本营的伤害造成的伤害较低.

p.k: Creepers move much more slowly under sunlight.
p.v: 苦力怕在白天的移动速度将大幅减慢.

p.k: An infectious variant of the zombie which zombifies
p.v: 僵尸单位的一种变种

p.k: villagers and piglins after killing them.
p.v: 僵尸在击杀村民或猪灵后会将其转化为僵尸.

p.k: Drowned will burn under sunlight.
p.v: 在白天单位会燃烧.

p.k: Requires an upgrade at the Laboratory.
p.v: 需要在实验室研发

p.k: A hardy variant of the zombie with tougher skin.
p.v: 僵尸单位的防护变种,拥有更坚韧的皮肤.

p.k: Husks DO NOT burn under sunlight.
p.v: Husks 不会在阳光下燃烧.

p.k: Requires an upgrade at the Laboratory.
p.v: 需要在实验室研发

p.k: Spiders move much more slowly under sunlight.
p.v: 蜘蛛在阳光下的移动速度会大幅降低

p.k: A spider fanged with deadly poison.
p.v: 拥有致命毒液的蜘蛛变种.

p.k: Requires an upgrade at the Laboratory.
p.v: 需要在实验室研发

p.k: An undead soldier with a bow and arrows.
p.v: 一个手持弓箭的亡灵士兵.

p.k: Skeletons will burn under sunlight.
p.v: Skeletons 会在阳光下燃烧.

p.k: A giant spider that is nimble but frail.
p.v: 一个大型蜘蛛单位,但是比较脆弱.

p.k: Can be upgraded to allow skeletons to ride them.
p.v: 可以升级后允许骷髅骑乘他们.

p.k: Spiders move much more slowly under sunlight.
p.v: 蜘蛛在阳光下的移动速度会大幅降低

p.k: An chilling variant of the skeleton that fires slowing arrows.
p.v: 骷髅士兵的冰冻变种,可以射出减速箭让敌人减速.

p.k: Strays will burn under sunlight.
p.v: Strays 会在阳光下燃烧.

p.k: Requires an upgrade at the Laboratory.
p.v: 需要在实验室研发

p.k: A powerful but blind monster that can fire sonic booms.
p.v: 一个非常强大但是没有视野的怪物,可以发射音波冲击.

p.k: An undead monster with a basic melee attack.
p.v: 一个拥有基础近战攻击的亡灵士兵.

p.k: Zombies will burn under sunlight.
p.v: 僵尸 会在阳光下燃烧.

p.key: An undead worker that can construct and
p.value: 最基本的亡灵工人,可以建造和修理建筑

p.k: Zombie villagers DO NOT burn under sunlight.
p.v: 僵尸村民 不会在阳光下燃烧.

p.k: Welcome back... resuming at stage:
p.v: 欢迎回来..... 恢复到阶段:

p.k: Welcome to the Reign of Nether Tutorial!
p.v: 欢迎来到 Regign of Nether 教程!

p.k: Press F12 to get started.
p.v: 按下F12开始.

p.k: Skipping tutorial stage... you are now on:
p.v: 跳过教程阶段.... 你当前在阶段:

p.k: Press SPACE when you're ready to continue.
p.v: 按下 空格 当你准备继续.

p.k: Welcome to RTS view. Instead of the usual first-person minecraft camera, here we can view the world from a top-down perspective.
p.v: 欢迎来到RTS视角。与通常的第一人称Minecraft相机不同，在这里我们可以从上帝视角俯瞰世界。

p.k: TIP: If you want to see any of these messages again, open chat with ENTER or the button on the right.
p.v: 提示：如果你想再次查看这些消息，按下 ENTER 键或点击右侧的按钮打开聊天窗口。

p.k: If at any point you're lost or need a reminder on what to do next, click the button at the top right. Try doing that now to continue.
p.v: 如果你在任何时候感到迷失或需要提醒下一步该做什么，点击右上角的按钮。现在试着点击它以继续。

p.k: To move your camera, move your mouse to the edges of the screen. Try it now.
p.v: 要移动你的相机视角，将鼠标移到屏幕边缘。现在试试看。

p.k: TIP: You can also move the camera with arrow keys.
p.v: 提示：你也可以使用方向键移动相机视角。

p.k: TIP: You can zoom the camera with ALT+SCROLL and rotate it with ALT+RIGHT-CLICK.
p.v: 提示：你可以通过按住 ALT + 滚轮缩放相机，按住 ALT + 右键旋转相机。

p.k: Since you could get lost with a top-down view like this, here's a minimap for you to help navigate.
p.v: 由于你可能在这种上帝视角中迷失方向，提供一个小地图来帮助你导航。

p.k: You can move around the world quickly by clicking on a spot on the map. Try doing that now.
p.v: 你可以通过点击小地图上的某个位置快速移动到世界中的相应地点。现在试试看。

p.k: If you need to move really far away, you can also SHIFT+CLICK to recentre the map on that location.
p.v: 如果你需要移动到很远的地方，你也可以使用 SHIFT+单击将地图重新对准那个位置。

p.k: TIP: Press M or click the bottom right button to expand the map.
p.v: 提示：按 M 键或点击右下角的按钮展开地图。

p.k: It's time to start playing with some units.
p.v: 是时候开始使用一些单位了。

p.k: Let's get started by spawning in some villagers here.
p.v: 让我们从在这里生成一些村民开始。

p.k: Click the button at the top right and then click on the ground where you want to place them.
p.v: 点击右上角的按钮，然后点击你想要放置他们的地面。

p.k: Villagers are your worker units who can build and gather resources and are essential to starting and maintaining a good base.
p.v: 村民是你的工人单位，可以建造和收集资源，对于开始和维持一个良好的基地至关重要。

p.k: Try selecting one with LEFT-CLICK.
p.v: 试着用左键选择一个村民。

p.k: Now, RIGHT-CLICK where you want to move it.
p.v: 现在，右键点击你想移动的位置。

p.k: Now let's try selecting a group of villagers.
p.v: 现在让我们试着选择一群村民。

p.k: To do this, hold LEFT-CLICK and DRAG your mouse across them, then release to select.
p.v: 要做到这一点，按住左键并拖动鼠标穿过他们，然后松开以选择。

p.k: Now, RIGHT-CLICK where you want to move the group.
p.v: 现在，右键点击你想移动这群村民的位置。

p.k: TIP: You can also double click a unit to select all units of the same type.
p.v: 提示：你也可以双击一个单位来选择所有相同类型的单位。

p.k: TIP: If you want to deselect your units, press the tilde (~) key
p.v: 提示：如果你想取消选择单位，按下波浪号（~）键。

p.k: TIP: For you RTS fans, control grouping with CTRL+NUM is also a feature.
p.v: 提示：对于RTS爱好者，CTRL+数字键的编组功能也是可用的。

p.k: It's time to start your base.
p.v: 是时候开始建造你的基地了。

p.k: The first and most important building of any base is always the capitol.
p.v: 任何基地的第一个也是最重要的建筑总是首都。

p.k: This looks like a good spot for it, being flat ground, near lots of resources and with plenty of space around it for other buildings.
p.v: 这里看起来是个好地方，平坦的地面，靠近许多资源，并且周围有足够的空间建造其他建筑。

p.k: Note that building takes resources. Luckily, the TOP-LEFT shows we have more than enough WOOD and ORE needed.
p.v: 请注意，建造需要资源。幸运的是，左上角显示我们有足够的木材和矿石。

p.k: Select your workers, then click the bottom-left button and click on the ground where you want to place your capitol.
p.v: 选择你的工人，然后点击左下角的按钮，并点击你想放置首都的位置。

p.k: Just wait for your Town Centre to complete. If your workers stopped building for some reason, just select them and RIGHT-CLICK it to resume.
p.v: 等待你的城镇中心建造完成。如果你的工人因某种原因停止建造，只需选择他们并右键点击以继续。

p.k: You can also select the building itself like a unit to see how far along it is in building.
p.v: 你也可以像选择单位一样选择建筑物，查看它的建造进度。

p.k: Congratulations, you now have a base set up!
p.v: 恭喜，你现在已经建好了基地！

p.k: Capitols like the Town Centre are the only building that can produce workers like villagers.
p.v: 像城镇中心这样的首都是唯一可以生产工人（如村民）的建筑。

p.k: Note that producing workers takes 50 FOOD each. We should have enough resources for quite a lot.
p.v: 请注意，每生产一个工人需要50食物。我们应该有足够的资源来生产许多工人。

p.k: LEFT-CLICK to select your Town Centre, then RIGHT-CLICK on the ground to set a rally point.
p.v: 左键点击选择你的城镇中心，然后右键点击地面来设置集结点。

p.k: Now let's try making a villager. With your Town Centre selected, click the bottom-left button to start producing one.
p.v: 现在让我们试着制造一个村民。选择你的城镇中心，点击左下角的按钮开始生产。

p.k: TIP: You can queue up as many units to build as you can afford.
p.v: 提示：你可以根据你的资源排队生产多个单位。

p.k: TIP: You can cancel any in-progress units for a full refund by clicking their icon at the bottom.
p.v: 提示：你可以通过点击底部的图标取消任何正在生产的单位，并获得全额退款。

p.k: Now that we have a bunch of workers, we can start gathering some resources.
p.v: 现在我们有了一些工人，可以开始收集资源了。

p.k: There's a forest over here that we can get wood from.
p.v: 这里有一片森林，我们可以从中获取木材。

p.k: To gather a resource, select a worker, then RIGHT-CLICK a tree.
p.v: 要收集资源，选择一个工人，然后右键点击一棵树。

p.k: TIP: Workers keep gathering until told to do something else. Once they have at least 50 total resources they return it to the town centre.
p.v: 提示：工人会一直收集资源，直到被指示做其他事情。当他们至少有50单位资源时，他们会将其带回城镇中心。

p.k: Now let's do the same thing for ore.
p.v: 现在让我们对矿石做同样的事情。

p.k: Here's a beach with coal and copper we can get ore from.
p.v: 这里有一个海滩，我们可以从中获取煤炭和铜矿石。

p.k: Select a worker, then RIGHT-CLICK an ore block.
p.v: 选择一个工人，然后右键点击矿石块。

p.k: Well done.
p.v: 干得好。

p.k: TIP: Sandy biomes like deserts and beaches have more and better ores.
p.v: 提示：像沙漠和海滩这样的沙质生物群系拥有更多更好的矿石。

p.k: While your other workers are busy on wood and ore, let's find some food.
p.v: 当其他工人忙于木材和矿石时，让我们去寻找一些食物。

p.k: Here are some pigs that you can hunt for food.
p.v: 这里有一些猪，你可以猎杀它们获取食物。

p.k: Just like wood and ore, select a worker and RIGHT-CLICK an animal to start hunting it.
p.v: 就像木材和矿石一样，选择一个工人并右键点击一只动物开始狩猎。

p.k: Make sure your worker isn't holding any other resources!
p.v: 确保你的工人没有携带其他资源！

p.k: TIP: If your worker can't hold all the food after hunting an animal, it will drop to the ground.
p.v: 提示：如果你的工人在狩猎动物后无法携带所有食物，食物将掉落在地上。

p.k: TIP: Dropped items like food and saplings can be picked by ANY unit and returned for resources.
p.v: 提示：像食物和树苗这样的掉落物可以被任何单位拾取并带回资源。

p.k: Great work!
p.v: 干得好！

p.k: Your villager should now return the food to your town centre, but if they aren't, simply select the villager and RIGHT-CLICK your Town Centre.
p.v: 你的村民现在应该会把食物带回城镇中心，但如果他们没有这样做，只需选择村民并右键点击你的城镇中心。

p.k: TIP: Units hold up to 100 total resources, but hunting allows you to go above this maximum.
p.v: 提示：单位最多可以携带100单位资源，但狩猎允许你超过这个上限。

p.k: Let's expand your base. Some new buildings have been unlocked for you. Select a worker if you haven't already to check them out.
p.v: 让我们扩展你的基地。一些新建筑已经为你解锁。如果你还没有选择工人，请选择一个工人查看。

p.k: Stockpiles can give your workers a place to drop off resources faster.
p.v: 储存仓可以让你的工人更快地存放资源。

p.k: Houses raise your max unit population. Check the top left for your current totals.
p.v: 房屋可以增加你的最大单位人口。查看左上角以了解当前的总数。

p.k: Farms give you a slow but renewable source of food in exchange for wood.
p.v: 农场为你提供缓慢但可再生的食物来源，以木材为代价。

p.k: Finally, a barracks lets you start training soldiers to fight enemies.
p.v: 最后，兵营让你开始训练士兵与敌人作战。

p.k: Let's take some time to check out a few of these buildings.
p.v: 让我们花些时间查看这些建筑。

p.k: When you're ready, build a barracks and get prepared to train your first army.
p.v: 当你准备好时，建造一个兵营并准备训练你的第一支军队。

p.k: Great job.
p.v: 做得好。

p.k: The barracks is one of many buildings that can produce military units. Select your barracks to check them out.
p.v: 兵营是许多可以生产军事单位的建筑之一。选择你的兵营来查看它们。

p.k: Vindicators are melee units with high health and moderate damage.
p.v: 卫道士是拥有高生命值和中等伤害的近战单位。

p.k: Pillagers are ranged units which attack slowly but with high damage.
p.v: 掠夺者是远程单位，攻击速度慢但伤害高。

p.k: Try building 3 units from here to continue.
p.v: 从这里开始建造3个单位以继续。

p.k: Awesome!
p.v: 真棒！

p.k: TIP: If you lose track of your military units, you can press K or click the button on the right to select all of them at once.
p.v: 提示：如果你跟丢了你的军事单位，你可以按K键或点击右侧的按钮一次性选择所有单位。

p.k: Uh oh, looks like some monsters are about to attack!
p.v: 哦不，看起来一些怪物即将攻击！

p.k: With your units selected, RIGHT-CLICK an enemy to attack them. Units will also automatically attack nearby enemies if they are idle.
p.v: 选择你的单位后，右键点击一个敌人攻击他们。单位在空闲时也会自动攻击附近的敌人。

p.k: Watch out! More monsters incoming!
p.v: 小心！更多的怪物来了！

p.k: Dawn breaks!
p.v: 黎明到来！

p.k: Nicely done, you successfully defended your base!
p.v: 做得好，你成功防守了你的基地！

p.k: Looks like some of your buildings were damaged in the attack.
p.v: 看起来你的一些建筑在攻击中受到了损坏。

p.k: Try repairing one of them by selecting a villager, then RIGHT-CLICKING the damaged building. Repairs cost 1 wood for each block.
p.v: 试着通过选择一个村民，然后右键点击损坏的建筑进行修复。每个方块的修复费用为1单位木材。

p.k: TIP: Building health is determined by how many blocks it's made up of. If they have less than half blocks remaining, they are destroyed completely.
p.v: 提示：建筑物的生命值取决于它由多少个方块组成。如果剩余的方块少于一半，它们将完全被摧毁。

p.k: The monsters have a base across the river (but you can't see it yet because fog of war is enabled). We should destroy it before they attack again.
p.v: 怪物在河对岸有一个基地（但你暂时看不到，因为战争迷雾已启用）。我们应该在他们再次进攻之前摧毁它。

p.k: To cross the river, we need to build a bridge.
p.v: 为了过河，我们需要建造一座桥。

p.k: This looks like a good spot for one. Select a worker and build a bridge here. You can scroll to rotate the bridge before placement.
p.v: 这里看起来是一个不错的位置。选择一个工人并在这里建造一座桥。在放置之前，你可以滚动来旋转桥梁。

p.k: TIP: You may need more than one bridge segment to cross the river. After completing one you can connect new segments to it.
p.v: 提示：你可能需要多个桥段来过河。完成一个桥段后，你可以连接新的桥段。

p.k: Nice job.
p.v: 做得好。

p.k: TIP: Bridges are always neutral regardless of who built them. This means anyone can attack, repair and connect new segments to them.
p.v: 提示：无论是谁建造的，桥梁始终是中立的。这意味着任何人都可以攻击、修复并连接新的桥段。

p.k: TIP: Be very careful when crossing bridges. If it is destroyed while your units are crossing, they will land in the water and be defenceless!
p.v: 提示：过桥时要非常小心。如果桥梁在你的单位过桥时被摧毁，他们将落入水中并且无法自卫！

p.k: Reinforcements have arrived! Use them to crush the enemy base!
p.v: 援军已到达！用他们来摧毁敌人的基地！

p.k: Your army includes an iron golem and your workers can now build blacksmiths to produce more if needed.
p.v: 你的军队包括一个铁傀儡，如果需要，你的工人现在可以建造铁匠铺来生产更多的铁傀儡。

p.k: TIP: Most ranged units can't attack buildings. Order them to attack units instead!
p.v: 提示：大多数远程单位不能攻击建筑物。命令他们攻击单位吧！

p.k: TIP: The monsters' capitol, the Mausoleum, produces an artificial night time around it. If you can destroy it during the day, undead units will burn under the sun.
p.v: 提示：怪物的首都，陵墓，会在周围产生一个人造夜晚。如果你能在白天摧毁它，不死单位将在阳光下燃烧。

p.k: Nicely done.
p.v: 做得好。

p.k: Good work!
p.v: 干得漂亮！

p.k: Excellent.
p.v: 出色。

p.k: Nice work.
p.v: 干得好。

p.k: Great job!
p.v: 做得好！

p.k: Congratulations, you now have a base set up!
p.v: 恭喜，你现在已经建好了基地！

p.k: Nice work. Workers are vital for a healthy base!
p.v: 干得好。工人对于维持一个健康的基地至关重要！

p.k: Well done.
p.v: 干得好。

p.k: Great work!
p.v: 干得好！

p.k: Excellent.
p.v: 出色。

p.k: Great job.
p.v: 做得好。

p.k: Awesome!
p.v: 太棒了！

p.k: Dawn breaks!
p.v: 黎明破晓！

p.k: Nicely done, you successfully defended your base!
p.v: 做得好，你成功地防守住了你的基地！

p.k: Good job!
p.v: 干得漂亮！

p.k: Nice job.
p.v: 干得好。

p.k: Congratulations! You have completed the tutorial!
p.v: 恭喜！你已经完成了教程！

p.k: Tutorial mode disabled
p.v: 教程模式已禁用。

p.k: If they aren't already, you can have all of your villagers help to build to speed up progress. To do this, select your workers and RIGHT-CLICK the building.
p.v: 如果他们还没有开始，你可以让所有村民帮助建造，以加快进度。为此，选择你的工人并右键点击建筑物。

p.k: Note that producing workers takes 50 FOOD each. We should have enough resources for quite a lot.
p.v: 请注意，每生产一个工人需要50食物。我们应该有足够的资源来生产很多工人。

p.k: LEFT-CLICK to select your Town Centre, then RIGHT-CLICK on the ground to set a rally point.
p.v: 左键点击选择你的城镇中心，然后右键点击地面设置集结点。

p.k: TIP: you can queue up as many units to build as you can afford.
p.v: 提示：你可以根据你的资源排队建造尽可能多的单位。

p.k: TIP: you can cancel any in-progress units for a full refund by clicking their icon at the bottom.
p.v: 提示：你可以通过点击底部的图标取消任何正在建造的单位，并获得全额退款。

p.k: LEFT-CLICK to select your Town Centre, RIGHT-CLICK to set a rally point - units will automatically go to that spot when they appear.
p.v: 左键点击选择你的城镇中心，右键点击设置集结点——单位出现后会自动前往该位置。

p.k: Select any villager, then RIGHT-CLICK any tree.
p.v: 选择任意村民，然后右键点击任意树木。

p.k: When you're ready, build a barracks and get prepare to train your first army.
p.v: 当你准备好时，建造一个兵营，并准备训练你的第一支军队。

p.k: TIP: During an attack, be sure to protect your workers. If a worker dies while holding resources, it is dropped and can be stolen by your enemies!
p.v: 提示：在攻击期间，一定要保护你的工人。如果工人在携带资源时死亡，资源会掉落并可能被你的敌人偷走！

p.k: The monsters have a base across the river, we should destroy it before they attack again.
p.v: 怪物在河对岸有一个基地，我们应该在它们再次攻击之前摧毁它。

p.k: Congratulations! You have completed the tutorial!
p.v: 恭喜！你已经完成了教程！

p.k: You may now continue with all of the buildings and units unlocked.
p.v: 你现在可以继续游戏，所有的建筑和单位已解锁。

p.k: To reset the game and try a new faction, type /rts-reset
p.v: 要重置游戏并尝试一个新阵营，请输入 /rts-reset

p.k: If you would like to play against another player, check out the Reign of Nether CurseForge page for a guide on server hosting.
p.v: 如果你想与其他玩家对战，请查看 Reign of Nether 的 CurseForge 页面，获取服务器托管指南。

p.k: Until next time... Good luck and have fun!
p.v: 直到下次见... 祝你好运，玩得开心！

p.k: F12 - Toggle RTS camera
p.v: F12 - 切换RTS视角

p.k: F8 - Refresh chunks
p.v: F8 - 刷新区块

p.k: F7 - Toggle FPS/TPS counters
p.v: F7 - 切换显示 FPS/TPS 计数器

p.k: F6 - Toggle hide leaves (experimental)
p.v: F6 - 切换隐藏树叶（实验性）

p.k: ~ - Deselect all units and buildings
p.v: ~ - 取消选择所有单位和建筑

p.k: /rts-fog enable/disable - Toggle fog of war for all players
p.v: /rts-fog enable/disable - 切换所有玩家的战争迷雾

p.k: /rts-surrender - Concede the match
p.v: /rts-surrender - 认输

p.k: /rts-reset - Delete all units/buildings, set all to spectator
p.v: /rts-reset - 删除所有单位/建筑，将所有单位设置为观众

p.k: /rts-lock enable/disable - Prevent all players from joining the RTS match
p.v: /rts-lock enable/disable - 阻止所有玩家加入RTS比赛

p.k: Right click - move, attack or set rallypoint
p.v: 右键点击 - 移动，攻击或设置集结点

p.k: Ctrl + number key - Create control group
p.v: Ctrl + 数字键 - 创建控制组

p.k: Shift + left-click on map - recenter map
p.v: Shift + 左键点击地图 - 重新居中地图

p.k: Double left-click on unit - select all same units
p.v: 双击左键点击单位 - 选择所有相同单位

p.k: Delete - destroy selected units/buildings
p.v: Delete - 摧毁选择的单位/建筑

p.k: Alt + right-click - rotate camera
p.v: Alt + 右键点击 - 旋转相机

p.k: Alt + scroll - zoom in/out
p.v: Alt + 滚动 - 放大/缩小

p.k: Allows portals to be constructed off of nether terrain
p.v: 允许在非下界地形上建造传送门，

p.k: and enables them to be upgraded into transport portals,
p.v: 并能将其升级为运输传送门(transport portals),

p.k: which can instantly teleport units between them.
p.v: 可以在它们之间超时空传送单位。

p.k: Allows Blazes to fire a single shot that ignites all
p.v: 允许烈焰人发射的一枚火球点燃路径内所有方块，

p.k: blocks in a line, but disables their attacks temporarily.
p.v: 但会使其进入虚弱状态，暂时无法进行攻击。

p.k: Allows Brutes to raise a shield to reduce projectile
p.v: 使蛮兵能够举起盾牌减少伤害

p.k: damage taken by 67% and movement speed by 50%.
p.v: 所受伤害减少67%，移动速度减少50%.

p.k: Upgrades this castle to be able to promote an illager unit
p.v: 升级这座城堡，使其能够晋升掠夺者单位

p.k: to a captain that provides a speed aura to friendly units.
p.v: 晋升为队长，给友方单位提供速度光环.

p.k: Each upgraded castle may only support one captain at a time.
p.v: 每座升级的城堡同一时间只能支持一名队长.

p.k: Transforms all of your zombies into drowned, which
p.v: 将你所有的僵尸转化为溺尸，它们

p.k: zombify Villager and Piglin units after killing them.
p.v: 在杀死村民和猪灵单位后使其变为僵尸。

p.k: Requires a Graveyard.
p.v: 需要墓地。

p.k: Unlocks the ability for evokers to summon vexes.
p.v: 解锁唤魔者召唤恼鬼的能力。

p.k: Requires evokers to have been unlocked.
p.v: 需要唤魔者已被解锁。

p.k: Your units become immune to fire tick damage and magma.
p.v: 你的单位免疫火焰灼伤伤害和岩浆伤害。

p.k: Standing directly in fire or lava still causes damage.
p.v: 直接站在火焰或熔岩中仍然会受到伤害。

p.k: Allows villagers to construct iron golems.
p.v: 允许村民直接建造铁傀儡.

p.k: Headhunters' tridents knock enemies back on hit.
p.v: 猎头者的三叉戟击中敌人时会将其击退.

p.k: Unlocks the ability for headhunters to mount hoglins.
p.v: 解锁猎头者骑乘疣猪兽的能力.

p.k: Transforms all of your zombies into husks,
p.v: 将你所有的僵尸转化为尸壳，

p.k: granting them +5 health and immunity to sunlight.
p.v: 赋予它们+5生命值并免疫阳光。

p.k: Requires a Graveyard.
p.v: 需要墓地。

p.k: Adds a lightning rod to this lab that can be activated
p.v: 为该实验室添加一个避雷针，可以激活

p.k: to call lightning to charge creepers and damage enemies.
p.v: 用来召唤闪电，充能苦力怕并伤害敌人。

p.k: Requires a Dungeon.
p.v: 需要地牢。

p.k: Doubles the duration of witches' potion clouds.
p.v: 将女巫药水云的持续时间翻倍。

p.k: Enchants the crossbows of all pillagers with multishot
p.v: 给弩箭附魔多重射击

p.k: Transforms your Spiders into Cave Spiders,
p.v: 将你的蜘蛛转化为洞穴蜘蛛，

p.k: Requires a Spider Lair.
p.v: 需要蜘蛛巢穴。

p.k: Convert into a civilian portal, supplying 15 population
p.v: 转化为平民传送门，提供15人口上限

p.k: and allowing workers to drop resources off here.
p.v: 并允许工人在此处存放资源。

p.k: Convert into a military portal, allowing production
p.v: 转化为军事传送门，允许生产

p.k: of military units based on the buildings you own.
p.v: 基于你拥有的建筑生产军事单位。

p.k: Convert into a transport portal, allowing for instant
p.v: 转化为传送门，允许瞬间

p.k: teleportation of units to another linked transport portal.
p.v: 将单位传送到另一个连接的传送门。

p.k: Requires research at a Fortress.
p.v: 需要在要塞进行研究。

p.k: Unlocks the ability for pillagers to mount ravagers,
p.v: 解锁掠夺者骑乘劫掠兽的能力，

p.k: gaining explosive arrows that shoot upwards like mortar.
p.v: 并获得像迫击炮一样向上射出的爆炸箭。

p.k: Raises the resource capacity of workers from 100 to 200
p.v: 将工人的资源容量从100提升至200

p.k: Workers still auto-return resources when holding above 50
p.v: 工人在携带超过50单位资源时仍会自动返还资源

p.k: Gives your buildings a 10 chance to spawn
p.v: 给予你的建筑在方块被破坏时有10%的几率生成

p.k: a silverfish whenever a block is destroyed.
p.v: 一个蠹虫。

p.k: Silverfish have limited lifespans.
p.v: 蠹虫有有限的生命期。

p.k: Requires a Stronghold.
p.v: 需要堡垒。

p.k: Unlocks the ability for skeletons to mount spiders.
p.v: 解锁骷髅骑乘蜘蛛的能力。

p.k: Requires a Spider Lair.
p.v: 需要蜘蛛巢穴。

p.k: Transforms all of your skeletons into
p.v: 将你所有的骷髅转化为

p.k: strays which fire slowing arrows.
p.v: 流浪者，它们射出减速箭。

p.k: Requires a Graveyard.
p.v: 需要墓地。

p.k: Upgrades the axes of all vindicators to diamond (+2 damage)
p.v: 将所有卫道士的斧头升级为钻石（+2伤害）。

p.k: Enemies killed by wither skeletons leave
p.v: 被凋零骷髅杀死的敌人会留下

p.k: behind a deadly cloud of wither on death.
p.v: 致命的凋零云雾。
